articles.title: John McAfee found dead in Spanish prison after his extradition to the US was approved - CNN
articles.description: John McAfee, the controversial antivirus software magnate who'd had multiple recent run-ins with the US law, has died at 75. McAfee was awaiting extradition in a Spanish prison after being charged with tax evasion in the United States last year.
